memberdef.definition: slope_constrained_planner documentation master created by sphinx quickstart on Mon but it should at least contain the root toctree directive Master on the and TV They are characterized by outstanding mechanical design and control making them capable of doing unprecedented including climbing stairs and stepping on obstacles on their path These robots might play a crucial role in different from outdoor transportation in areas not reachable through roads to search and rescue after environmental e earthquakes despite their unprecedented it turns out that they still lack fully autonomous they lack the capability of autonomously finding a safe path in hazardous for when moving uphill or downhill on rough outdoor e climbing a hill Please notice as an the popular Boston Dynamics’ SPOT cannot manage slopes of more than degrees This thesis aims to make quadruped robots capable of finding a safe given a start and a goal on uneven outdoor terrain
